newsitem.title: GERMANY: Lufthansa shares surge 5.6 pct in bourse.
newsitem.headline: Lufthansa shares surge 5.6 pct in bourse.

text.p: Shares in Deutsche Lufthansa AG advanced almost six percent to 23.40 marks in early bourse trade on Wednesday after the German airline announced plans for a major restructuring programme that will include job cuts.
At 1000 GMT, Lufthansa shares had pared some gains to trade up 1.20 marks at 23.35 marks and just off the session high so far at 23.45 marks.
The broader 30-share DAX index of German blue-chip stocks was up 19.39 points at 3,086.45 points.

Lufthansa said it would reorganise its businesses into autonomous profit centres in a move aimed at cutting management and administration positions by a minimum of 10 percent ahead of the deregulation of European airlines on April 1.
